Hoeveel pakketten zijn er in totaal gele: SELECT SUM(number_of_parcels) FROM delivery_facts WHERE month_id = '202312';
Wat is het gemiddelde aantal pakketten p: SELECT AVG(number_of_parcels) FROM delivery_facts WHERE month_id = '202306';
Hoeveel klanten hebben meer dan 5 pakket: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT account_id_hashed) FROM delivery_facts WHERE number_of_parcels > 5;
Welke maand had het hoogste aantal eerst: SELECT month_id, SUM(parcels_home_1st) AS total_first_attempts FROM delivery_facts WHERE month_id LIKE '2023%' GROUP BY month_id ORDER BY total_first_attempts DESC LIMIT 1;
Hoeveel pakketten zijn er in totaal gele: SELECT SUM(number_of_parcels) FROM delivery_facts WHERE month_id BETWEEN '202301' AND '202303';
Wat is het percentage van de pakketten d: SELECT (SUM(parcels_home_1st) * 100.0 / SUM(number_of_parcels)) AS percentage_first_try FROM delivery_facts WHERE month_id = '202307';
Hoeveel unieke klanten ontvingen pakkett: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT account_id_hashed) FROM delivery_facts WHERE month_id LIKE '2023%';
Wat is het gemiddelde aantal pakketten p: SELECT AVG(number_of_parcels) FROM delivery_facts WHERE month_id LIKE '2023%';
Hoeveel klanten hebben precies 3 pakkett: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM delivery_facts WHERE number_of_parcels = 3;
Welke maand in 2023 had het laagste aant: SELECT month_id, SUM(number_of_parcels) AS total_parcels FROM delivery_facts WHERE month_id LIKE '2023%' GROUP BY month_id ORDER BY total_parcels ASC LIMIT 1;
Hoeveel pakketten zijn in totaal afgelev: SELECT SUM(number_of_parcels) FROM delivery_facts JOIN customers ON delivery_facts.account_id_hashed = customers.account_id_hashed WHERE customers.postcode BETWEEN '1000' AND '1099' AND month_id LIKE '2023%';
Wat is het aantal afgeleverde pakketten: SELECT month_id, SUM(number_of_parcels) FROM delivery_facts WHERE month_id LIKE '2023%' GROUP BY month_id;
Hoeveel pakketten werden er in totaal af: SELECT SUM(number_of_parcels) FROM delivery_facts WHERE month_id BETWEEN '202304' AND '202306'
